EmailTemplate.description: Email to Manager if Lost Reason is Unknown/Lost Contact
EmailTemplate.name: Unknown/Lost Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Lost Reason is Unknown/Lost Contact on {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Manager,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} has set the Closed Lost Reason to the opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} as Unknown/Lost Contact.
Click here to visit the Opportunity.
